verses.verse: O give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he is <S%H2896>good:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endureth <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
Let the <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> so, <S%H834>whom<s%> he hath <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> from the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H6862>enemy;<s%>

And <S%H6908>gathered<s%> them out of the <S%H4480>lands,<s%> <S%H776><s%> from the <S%H4480>east,<s%> <S%H4217><s%> and from the <S%H4480>west,<s%> <S%H4628><s%> from the <S%H4480>north,<s%> <S%H6828><s%> and from the <S%H4480>south.<s%> <S%H3220><s%>
They <S%H8582>wandered<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> in a <S%H3452>solitary<s%> <S%H1870>way;<s%> they <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> to <S%H4186>dwell<s%> in.
Hungry <S%H7457><s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> <S%H6771>thirsty,<s%> their <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H5848>fainted<s%> in them.
Then they <S%H6817>cried<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in their <S%H6862>trouble,<s%> and he <S%H5337>delivered<s%> them out of their <S%H4480>distresses.<s%> <S%H4691><s%>
And he led them <S%H1869>forth<s%> by the <S%H3477>right<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> that they might <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4186>habitation.<s%>
Oh that men would <S%H3034>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for his <S%H2617>goodness,<s%> and for his wonderful <S%H6381>works<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men!<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H7646>satisfieth<s%> the <S%H8264>longing<s%> <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and <S%H4390>filleth<s%> the <S%H7457>hungry<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> with <S%H2896>goodness.<s%>
Such as <S%H3427>sit<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and in the shadow of <S%H6757>death,<s%> being <S%H615>bound<s%> in <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and <S%H1270>iron;<s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> they rebelled <S%H4784>against<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H410>God,<s%> and <S%H5006>contemned<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the most High: <S%H5945><s%>
Therefore he brought <S%H3665>down<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> with <S%H5999>labor;<s%> they fell <S%H3782>down,<s%> and there was <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H5826>help.<s%>
Then they <S%H2199>cried<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in their <S%H6862>trouble,<s%> and he <S%H3467>saved<s%> them out of their <S%H4480>distresses.<s%> <S%H4691><s%>
He brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4480>darkness<s%> <S%H2822><s%> and the shadow of <S%H6757>death,<s%> and <S%H5423>broke<s%> their <S%H4147>bands<s%> in sunder.
Oh that men would <S%H3034>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for his <S%H2617>goodness,<s%> and for his wonderful <S%H6381>works<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men!<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> he hath <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H1817>gates<s%> of <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and <S%H1438>cut<s%> the <S%H1280>bars<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%> in sunder.
Fools <S%H191><s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H1870><s%> of their <S%H6588>transgression,<s%> and because of their <S%H4480>iniquities,<s%> <S%H5771><s%> are <S%H6031>afflicted.<s%>
Their <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H8581>abhorreth<s%> all <S%H3605>manner<s%> of <S%H400>meat;<s%> and they draw <S%H5060>near<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H4194>death.<s%>
Then they <S%H2199>cry<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in their <S%H6862>trouble,<s%> and he <S%H3467>saveth<s%> them out of their <S%H4480>distresses.<s%> <S%H4691><s%>
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> his <S%H1697>word,<s%> and <S%H7495>healed<s%> them, and <S%H4422>delivered<s%> them from their <S%H4480>destructions.<s%> <S%H7825><s%>
Oh that men would <S%H3034>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for his <S%H2617>goodness,<s%> and for his wonderful <S%H6381>works<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men!<s%>
And let them <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving,<s%> and <S%H5608>declare<s%> his <S%H4639>works<s%> with <S%H7440>rejoicing.<s%>
They that go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H3220>sea<s%> in <S%H591>ships,<s%> that <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4399>business<s%> in <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters;<s%>
These <S%H1992><s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and his <S%H6381>wonders<s%> in the <S%H4688>deep.<s%>
For he <S%H559>commandeth,<s%> and <S%H5975>raiseth<s%> the <S%H5591>stormy<s%> <S%H7307>wind,<s%> which lifteth <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H1530>waves<s%> thereof.
They mount <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> they go <S%H3381>down<s%> again to the <S%H8415>depths:<s%> their <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H4127>melted<s%> because of <S%H7451>trouble.<s%>
They reel to and <S%H2287>fro,<s%> and <S%H5128>stagger<s%> like a drunken <S%H7910>man,<s%> and are at their wits' <S%H3605>end.<s%> <S%H2451><s%> <S%H1104><s%>
Then they <S%H6817>cry<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in their <S%H6862>trouble,<s%> and he bringeth them <S%H3318>out<s%> of their <S%H4480>distresses.<s%> <S%H4691><s%>
He <S%H6965>maketh<s%> the <S%H5591>storm<s%> a <S%H1827>calm,<s%> so that the <S%H1530>waves<s%> thereof are <S%H2814>still.<s%>
Then are they <S%H8055>glad<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they be <S%H8367>quiet;<s%> so he <S%H5148>bringeth<s%> them <S%H413>unto<s%> their <S%H2656>desired<s%> <S%H4231>haven.<s%>
Oh that men would <S%H3034>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for his <S%H2617>goodness,<s%> and for his wonderful <S%H6381>works<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men!<s%>
Let them <S%H7311>exalt<s%> him also in the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H1984>praise<s%> him in the <S%H4186>assembly<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders.<s%>
He <S%H7760>turneth<s%> <S%H5104>rivers<s%> into a <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and the <S%H4325>watersprings<s%> <S%H4161><s%> into dry <S%H6774>ground;<s%>
A <S%H6529>fruitful<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> into <S%H4420>barrenness,<s%> for the <S%H4480>wickedness<s%> <S%H7451><s%> of them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein.
He <S%H7760>turneth<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> into a <S%H98>standing<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H6723>dry<s%> <S%H776>ground<s%> into <S%H4161>watersprings.<s%> <S%H4325><s%>
And <S%H8033>there<s%> he maketh the hungry to <S%H3427>dwell,<s%> <S%H7457><s%> that they may <S%H3559>prepare<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> for <S%H4186>habitation;<s%>
And <S%H2232>sow<s%> the <S%H7704>fields,<s%> and <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> which may <S%H6213>yield<s%> <S%H6529>fruits<s%> of <S%H8393>increase.<s%>
He <S%H1288>blesseth<s%> them also, so that they are <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H3966>greatly;<s%> and suffereth <S%H3808>not<s%> their <S%H929>cattle<s%> to <S%H4591>decrease.<s%>
Again, they are <S%H4591>minished<s%> and brought <S%H7817>low<s%> through <S%H4480>oppression,<s%> <S%H6115><s%> <S%H7451>affliction,<s%> and <S%H3015>sorrow.<s%>

He <S%H8210>poureth<s%> <S%H937>contempt<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H5081>princes,<s%> and causeth them to <S%H8582>wander<s%> in the <S%H8414>wilderness,<s%> where there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1870>way.<s%>
Yet setteth he the poor on <S%H7682>high<s%> <S%H34><s%> from <S%H4480>affliction,<s%> <S%H6040><s%> and <S%H7760>maketh<s%> him <S%H4940>families<s%> like a <S%H6629>flock.<s%>
The <S%H3477>righteous<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> it, and <S%H8055>rejoice:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> shall <S%H7092>stop<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
Whoso <S%H4310><s%> is <S%H2450>wise,<s%> and will <S%H8104>observe<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things, even they shall <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
